citations.narrative:
Housekeeping. There are several pokeweed plants growing along the inside sections of the fence housing the reindeer.
Pokeweed is listed as a poisonous plant for animals and may result in toxicity if consumed by animals. Correct by
removing pokeweed from the reindeer enclosure. Correct by July 5, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.131(c) 
   
Sanitation. 
Housekeeping. There are several pokeweed plants growing along the inside sections of the fence housing the reindeer. 
Pokeweed is listed as a poisonous plant for animals and may result in toxicity if consumed by animals. Correct by 
removing pokeweed from the reindeer enclosure. Correct by July 5, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
